CONJUGATES: adjective: roundabout | more roundabout | most roundabout | noun: roundabout | roundabouts

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: adjective - describes a noun or pronoun
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Not taking the shortest or most direct way; indirect.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 迂回的；间接的；不直接的
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We decided to take a roundabout route to avoid the main highway.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们决定走一条绕远的路线以避开主干道。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: noun - a word that names something, such as a person, place, thing, or idea
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: (Chiefly British English) A road junction at which traffic moves in one direction around a central island to reach one of the roads leading off it.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: （主要为英式英语）环形交叉路口；环岛
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The new roundabout has significantly improved traffic flow in the town center.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 新的环岛大大改善了市中心的交通流量。
